content.rendered:
Customer Reviews

Advanced Property Strategies

“I have the pleasure to be able to pass on our sincerest thanks for all the background work and support received from all the Canterbury International Staff over the 3 Days of the Fast Track Mentoring Program.

From Arrival – the Reception Staff knew what was required to make sure my colleagues felt comfortable and were well supported.  Everyone involved from the Canterbury, were attentive, friendly, funny and very obliging – no task was too much, and this made the whole event go so well for my colleagues.

My colleague and facilitator of the 3 Day Event – has been very complimentary and asked that I pass on her Congratulations and Sincerest Thanks – she has stated what a pleasure it was to work with The Canterbury Staff throughout the 3 days.”

James Dowsley & Associates

“It was a terrific lunch and we couldn’t be happier with your venue and service.”

Anniversary 

Venue: great.  Food: great.  Service: great.  It all ran like clockwork & we received nothing but praise from our guests.  Please pass our heartfelt thanks to the staff.  It was a memorable night for all the right reasons.

Hotel Guest
“Great place to stay, comfortable and well-appointed room with a beautiful bathroom. Good location. Quiet room considering heavy traffic outside. Would definitely stay again.”

Hotel Guest
“My first visit there and it certainly won’t be the last. I loved it. Amazing food and awesome service. Will definitely be back.”

Hotel Guest
“My first time staying at the Canterbury; hopefully not my last. Beautiful comfortable room, staff who went out of their way to make sure I had all I needed & breakfast was spectacular! Thank you very much to everyone who made my stay so relaxing & enjoyable.”

Hotel Guest
“Loved it here, lovely staff and quality surroundings, would definitely stay here again.”

Restaurant
“Our Valentine’s celebration at Canterbury was second to none. Superb food and excellent service. Beautiful atmosphere, relaxing with live piano music playing. Highly recommended”
